principles.title: Empowerment
principles.body: We're ready to get serious with this. Just let it work around and play. Everybody should paint what they see and what they feel.

principles.title: Passion
principles.body: Anyone can paint! If there's a secret to anything, it's practice. If you over-mix it, you just get one dead color.

principles.title: Inclusion
principles.body: Drop in a fantastic, big ol' mountain. This is the lazy man's way of painting. Wherever you think they should be, then that's exactly where they should be.
